title: Simulation-Based Education for Community Disaster Preparedness and Resilience Building

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A collaborative process where community members (medical staff, youth leaders, general citizens, etc.) strengthen practical competencies through disaster-scenario-based training

learning_goals: Learners can develop individual and community-level response strategies across diverse disaster scenarios (e.g., fire, flood, infectious diseases).
Learners enhance decision-making and resource allocation skills in crisis situations through simulation training.
Learners collaborate with community members to establish and implement disaster recovery plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
